quote: Destiny is a lie. Destiny is justification for atrocity. It is the means by which murderers armour themselves against reprimand. It is a word intended to stand in place of ethics, denying all moral context.
author: Steven Erikson,  Midnight Tides

quote: Destiny is a name often given in retrospect to choices that had dramatic consequences.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: Destiny isn't something you make as you're told. By overcoming difficulties, life and this whole world can advance forward. That's what destiny is for. A world that has lost the power to advance forward, will be destroyed - Aladdin
author: Shinobu Ohtaka

quote: Your destiny is to fulfill those things upon which you focus most intently. So choose to keep your focus on that which is truly magnificent, beautiful, uplifting and joyful. Your life is always moving toward something.
author: Ralph Marston

quote: One love, one heart, one destiny.
author: Bob Marley

quote: To realize one's destiny is a person's only real obligation and when you want something, all the universe conspires in helping you to achieve it.
author: Paulo Coelho,  The Alchemist

quote: You can never know about about your own destiny: are the people you meet there to play a part on your oun destiny, or do you exist just to play a role in theirs?
author: Libba Bray,  Going Bovine

quote: Control Your Own Destiny or Someone Else Will
author: Jack Welch

quote: It is the road you take that decides your destiny and not your destiny that decides the road you take.
author: Apoorve Dubey,  The Flight Of Ambition

quote: I knew it like destiny, and at the same time, I knew it as choice.
author: Jeanette Winterson,  Lighthousekeeping

quote: Our thoughts define our destiny.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: If it is nothingness that awaits us, let us make an injustice of it; let us fight against destiny, even though without hope of victory.
author: Miguel de Unamuno

quote: Do you really believe in destiny?""How can I not believe in destiny, when there is no difference between my memories and my dreams at night? There's no difference between their reality. And if I dream something first, I remember it later when I am actually walking in the place or looking at the person I first dreamed of. Days later. Or years later. Destiny~ she walks with me.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Accept whatever comes to you woven in the pattern of your destiny, for what could more aptly fit your needs?
author: Marcus Aurelius,  Meditations

quote: Don't forget your history nor your destiny
author: Bob Marley

quote: Destiny, Talent, Calling, purpose. each of us came with our Talents, Purpose and Calling. What you do with them is the summary of your life here on earth.
author: Jaachynma N.E. Agu,  RISK IT, BE DIFFERENT!

quote: No matter what your history has been, your destiny is what you create today. What are you going to create?
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: No matter how much you know, your destiny depends on the Wisdom, Knowledge and Understanding you display.
author: James C. Uwandu,  Almost the Whole Thing

quote: I AM THE MASTER OF MY FATE AND THE CAPTAIN OF MY DESTINY.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Adapt yourself to the things among which your lot has been cast and love sincerely the fellow creatures with whom destiny has ordained that you shall live.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: Destiny is real. And she's not mild-mannered. She will come around and hit you in the face and knock you over and before you know what hit you, you're naked- stripped of everything you thought you knew and everything you thought you didn't know- and there you are! A bloody nose, bruises all over you, and naked. And it's the most beautiful thing.
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: Don't confuse poor decision-making with destiny. Own your mistakes. It’s ok; we all make them. Learn from them so they can empower you!
author: Steve Maraboli,  Life, the Truth, and Being Free

quote: Listen for the call of your destiny, and when it comes, release your plans and follow.
author: Mollie Marti

quote: Remember how far you’ve come, and you won’t have to rely on a destiny for your future. It will come on your own.
author: Shannon A. Thompson,  Seconds Before Sunrise

quote: I swear, the best things come to me by accident! Or should I say, effortless destiny?
author: C. JoyBell C.

quote: It is in your moments of decision that your destiny is shaped.
author: Tony Robbins

quote: It is in your moments of decision that your destiny is shaped.
author: Anthony Robbins

quote: There’s something really cool about knowing that your destiny is SO big that you’re not meant to share it with anyone. At least not yet.
author: Mandy Hale,  The Single Woman: Life, Love, and a Dash of Sass

quote: Every life has a destiny... the trick is to discover it before then end of your life. Otherwise, you will have too many regrets.
author: Kevin J. Anderson,  A Forest of Stars

quote: It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Fate and destiny are close woven within us and near them can be found the true genius of our lives.
author: Michael Meade

quote: I felt as if I were walking with destiny, and that all my past life had been but a preparation for this hour and for this trial... I thought I knew a good deal about it all, I was sure I should not fail.
author: Winston S. Churchill,  The Second World War

quote: I...have always known that my destiny was, above all, a literary destiny — that bad things and some good things would happen to me, but that, in the long run, all of it would be convertedinto words. Particularly the bad things, since happiness does not need to be transformed: happiness is its own end.
author: Jorge Luis Borges,  Seven Nights

quote: We the mortals touch the metals,the wind, the ocean shores, the stones,knowing they will go on, inert or burning,and I was discovering, naming all the these things:it was my destiny to love and say goodbye.
author: Pablo Neruda,  Still Another Day

quote: Decision decides destiny. What God wants you to become is the positive person you decide to become when led by God's spirit.
author: Israelmore Ayivor,  The Great Hand Book of Quotes

quote: Dreams won't always take you on a straight path to destiny, but they're usually related to what your soul wants for you.
author: Kelly Cutrone,  If You Have to Cry, Go Outside: And Other Things Your Mother Never Told You

quote: Once an object has been incorporated in a picture it accepts a new destiny.
author: Georges Braque

quote: You are the master of your destiny. You can influence, direct and control your own environment. You can make your life what you want it to be.
author: Napoleon Hill,  Think and Grow Rich

quote: Everything you need is already within you. The beauty of life is that your DESTINY lies always in your hands. The time has come for you to STEP UP and BE GREAT
author: Pablo

quote: I don't know what your destiny will be, but one thing I know: the only ones among you who will be really happy are those who have sought and found how to serve.
author: Albert Schweitzer

quote: ...remember one thing only: that it's you-nobody else-who determines your destiny and decides your fate. Nobody else can be alive for you; nor can you be alive for anybody else.
author: E.E. Cummings

quote: Dreams won't always take you on a straight path to destiny but they're usually related to what your soul wants for you. They'll force you to ask yourself the hard questions, they'll kick your ass and more importantly, they'll turn you on.
author: Kelly Cutrone,  If You Have to Cry, Go Outside: And Other Things Your Mother Never Told You

quote: I do want more. I am not content with being happy. I was not made for it. It is not my destiny. My destiny is the opposite.
author: Hermann Hesse,  Steppenwolf

quote: The whole secret of a successful life is to find out what is one's destiny to do, and then do it.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Could it have been anyone, or was it destiny? When I'm considering this I find it helpful to quote the wisdom of my father, who once told me, "Who knows why the fuck anything happens?
author: Ben Aaronovitch,  Midnight Riot

quote: You are beholdenTo the truthIt is the wayIt is the pathIt is your destinyTo be trueIs to be
author: Karen Hackel,  The Whisper of Your Soul

quote: One discovers that destiny can be diverted, that one does not have to remain in bondage to the first wax imprint made on childhood sensibilities. Once the deforming mirror has been smashed, there is a possibility of wholeness. There is a possibility of joy.
author: Anaïs Nin

quote: Your level of consciousness defines the beauty of your life and destiny.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Being human means throwing your whole life on the scales of destiny when need be, all the while rejoicing in every sunny day and every beautiful cloud.
author: Rosa Luxemburg

quote: The ramdomness of events in the world is so lacking in logic that we give it names like destiny, fate, karma and kismat to deal with the irrationality of its sequence
author: Anirban Bose,  Bombay Rains, Bombay Girls
